title: Spooky Action at a Distance
itunes:title: Spooky Action at a Distance
description:
Why did Einstein refer to quantum entanglement as "spooky action at a distance?" What is locality? Could quantum systems allow for faster than light communication? Could that violate causality? It's a spooky quantum episode of TechStuff!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Why did Einstein refer to quantum entanglement as "spooky action at a distance?" What is locality? Could quantum systems allow for faster than light communication? Could that violate causality? It's a spooky quantum episode of TechStuff!

itunes:keywords: quantum mechanics, physics, science, Einstein, Heisenberg, Schrodinger, Schrodinger's cat, spooky action at a distance, entanglement, superposition, tunneling, quantum computer, qubit, faster than light, causality
